function.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_CUSTOM_FIELD_CONTACT
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to Deploy Contact Custom Fields in Salesforce

label.description: Field Label : Enter a label to be used on displays, page layouts, reports, and list views. Also determines the Field Name used for internal reference. For example, if the Field Label is Email, the Field Name will be Email__c.

defaultCheckboxValue.description:
Default Value 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Checkbox')

length.description:
Length : Number of digits to the left of the decimal point 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency', 'Number') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency', 'Percent') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency', 'Text') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency', 'LongTextArea') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency', 'Html')

decimalPlace.description:
Decimal Places : Number of digits to the right of the decimal point 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency', 'Number') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Currency', 'Percent')

pickListValues.description:
Values : Enter values, with each value separated by a new line 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Picklist') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'Picklist', 'MultiselectPicklist')

visibleLines.description:
Visible Lines 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'MultiselectPicklist') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'MultiselectPicklist', 'LongTextArea') 
This field appears only when 'type' = 'MultiselectPicklist', 'Html')

helperText.description: Helper Text : This text displays on detail and edit pages when users hover over the Info icon next to this field.

function.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_CUSTOM_FIELD_ANY
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to Deploy Any Custom Fields an unknown object typein Salesforce

function.name: SALESFORCE_WRITE_SOQL_QUERY
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to write an SOQL query

query.description:
SOQL Query (example: "SELECT Id, Name
FROM Account
WHERE Name = 'Ethan'")

function.name: SALESFORCE_CREATE_CUSTOM_OBJECT
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to deploy a custom object

label.description: Label : Object Label to be used in tabs, page layouts, and reports. Also determines the Object Name used for internal reference. For example, if the Label is Account, the Object Name will be Account__c. (example: "Account")

description.description: Description : A description of the Custom Object.

recordName.description: Record Name : The Record Name appears in page layouts, key lists, related lists, lookups, and search results. For example, the Record Name for Account is "Account Name" and for Case it is "Case Number". (example: "Account Name")

function.name: SALESFORCE_DESCRIBE_ACTION_SCHEMA
function.description: Use this function to get the expected schema for an object type first, if no function matches the object type that the user wants to operate on. A payload in the schema returned by this function can be passed to CREATE_RECORD_ANY to create an object in the specified type, as payload

operation.description: Operation Type value for example CREATE_RECORD or UPDATE_RECORD

function.name: NOTION_CREATE_PAGE
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to create a page in Notion

function.name: NOTION_UPDATE_PAGE
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to update a page in Notion

pageId.description: Page ID : Specify the ID of the Page to Update. (example: "59833787-2cf9-4fdf-8782-e53db20768a5")

archived.description: Archived : Whether the page is archived (deleted). Set to true to archive a page. Set to false to un-archive (restore) a page.

function.name: NOTION_GET_PAGE_BY_ID
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to get a page by Id in Notion

pageId.description: Page ID : Specify the ID of the Page to Get. (example: "59833787-2cf9-4fdf-8782-e53db20768a5")

function.name: NOTION_ARCHIVE_PAGE
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to archive a page in Notion

pageId.description: Page ID : Specify the ID of the Page to Archive. (example: "59833787-2cf9-4fdf-8782-e53db20768a5")

function.name: NOTION_SEARCH_PAGES
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to search pages in Notion

function.name: NOTION_GET_PAGE_CONTENT
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to get a page content in Notion

blockId.description: Page ID : Specify a Block or Page ID to receive all of its blocks children in order. (example: "59833787-2cf9-4fdf-8782-e53db20768a5")

function.name: NOTION_UPDATE_BLOCK
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to update a block in Notion

blockId.description: Block ID : Specify the ID of the Block to Update. (example: "9bc30ad4-9373-46a5-84ab-0a7845ee52e6")

archived.description: Archived : Set to true to archive (delete) a block. Set to false to un-archive (restore) a block.

function.name: NOTION_GET_BLOCK_BY_ID
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to get a block by Id in Notion

blockId.description: Block ID : Specify the ID of the Block to Get. (example: "9bc30ad4-9373-46a5-84ab-0a7845ee52e6")

function.name: NOTION_DELETE_BLOCK
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to delete a block in Notion

blockId.description: Block ID : Specify the ID of the Block to Delete. (example: "9bc30ad4-9373-46a5-84ab-0a7845ee52e6")

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CREATE_EVENT
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to create an event

startTime.description: Start time : Accepts Unix timestamp or ISO8601 date formats.

endTime.description: End time : Defaults to one hour after the start time if left blank.

calendar.description: Calendar : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which calendar the event will be added to. Defaults to the users primary calendar if left blank.

attendees.description: Attendees : Accepts an array of email addresses or email addresses separated by commas.

eventId.description: Event ID : An ID from your application to associate this event with. You can use this ID to sync updates to this event later.

includeMeetLink.description: Include Google Meet link? : Automatically creates Google Meet conference link for this event.

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_UPDATE_EVENT
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to update an event

eventId.description: Event ID : The ID of the event to update.

startTime.description: Start time : Accepts Unix timestamp or ISO8601 date formats.

endTime.description: End time : Defaults to one hour after the start time if left blank.

calendar.description: Calendar : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which calendar the event will be added to. Defaults to the users primary calendar if left blank.

attendees.description: Attendees : Accepts an array of email addresses or email addresses separated by commas.

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_LIST_EVENTS
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to lists event

calendar.description: Calendar : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which calendar the event will be added to. Defaults to the users primary calendar if left blank.

after.description: After : Filters events that start after the provided date (Unix or ISO timestamp).

before.description: Before : Filters events that end before the provided date (Unix or ISO timestamp).

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_GET_EVENT_BY_ID
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to get event by Id

calendar.description: Calendar : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which calendar the event will be added to. Defaults to the users primary calendar if left blank.

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_DELETE_EVENT
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to get event by Id

eventId.description: Event ID : The ID of the calendar event to be deleted.

calendar.description: Calendar : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which calendar the event will be added to. Defaults to the users primary calendar if left blank.

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_GET_CONTACTS
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to get contacts

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_SEARCH_CONTACTS
function.description: Triggered when a user wants to search contacts

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_LIST_DIRECTORY_PEOPLE
function.description: List directory people

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_SEARCH_DIRECTORY_PEOPLE
function.description: Search directory people

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_LIST_OTHER_CONTACTS
function.description: List other contacts

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_SEARCH_OTHER_CONTACTS
function.description: Search other contacts

function.name: GOOGLE_CALENDAR_GET_AVAILABILITY
function.description: Get availability

timeMin.description: The start of the interval. In ISO format

timeMax.description: The end of the interval. In ISO format

timeZone.description: Time zone used in the response. Optional. The default is UTC.

items.description: List of calendars and/or groups to query. Defaults to the user default calendar.

function.name: GMAIL_SEND_EMAIL
function.description: Send a email in Gmail

toRecipients.description:
To : Specify the recipients as either a single string or a JSON array. (example: "[
  "recipient1@domain.com",
  "recipient2@domain.com"
]")

from.description: From : Specify the email of the sender.

subject.description: Subject : Specify the subject of the message.

messageContent.description: Message Content : Specify the content of the email message as plain text or HTML.

attachments.description: Attachments : Accepts either a single file object or a JSON array of file objects (example: "[{file object}, {file object}]")

function.name: GMAIL_GET_EMAIL_BY_ID
function.description: Get a email by id in Gmail

userId.description: User ID : Specify the users email address. (example: "user@domain.com")

messageId.description: Message ID : Specify the ID of the message to retrieve.

function.name: GMAIL_SEARCH_FOR_EMAIL
function.description: Search for a email in Gmail

emailFilterFormula.description: Search for email based on filter formula. For Example: var1:val1, var2 +val2

function.name: GMAIL_DELETE_EMAIL
function.description: Delete a email in Gmail

userId.description: User ID : Specify the users email address. (example: "user@domain.com")

messageId.description: Message ID : Specify the ID of the message to trash.

function.name: GMAIL_CREATE_A_CONTACT
function.description: Create a contact in Gmail

givenName.description: Given Name : Specify the Given Name of the Contact to create. (example: "John")

familyName.description: Family Name : Specify the Family Name of the Contact to create. (example: "Doe")

email.description: Email : Specify the Email Address of the Contact to create.

function.name: GMAIL_GET_CONTACT_BY_RESOURCE_NAME
function.description: Get a contact by resource name in Gmail

resourceName.description: Resource Name : Specify the resource name of the contact to fetch.

function.name: GMAIL_SEARCH_FOR_CONTACT
function.description: Search for a contact in Gmail

searchTerm.description: Term : Specify a search term to search for near or exact matches on the names, nickNames, emailAddresses, phoneNumbers, or organizations Contact properties.

function.name: GMAIL_DELETE_CONTACT
function.description: Delete a contact in Gmail

resourceName.description: Resource Name : Specify the resource name of the contact to delete.

function.name: GMAIL_CREATE_DRAFT
function.description: Create a draft in Gmail

toRecipients.description:
To : Specify the recipients as either a single string or a JSON array. (example: "[
  "recipient1@domain.com",
  "recipient2@domain.com"
]")

from.description: From : Specify the email of the sender.

subject.description: Subject : Specify the subject of the message.

messageContent.description: Message Content : Specify the content of the email message as plain text or HTML.

attachments.description: Attachments : Accepts either a single file object or a JSON array of file objects (example: "[{file object}, {file object}]")

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_GET_FILE_BY_ID
function.description: Get file by Id in Google Drive

fileId.description: File ID : The ID of the file. (example: "1PVW0QtmQv-829KNvV3DLbYL8WrpS4zhtPx2Ok")

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_SAVE_FILE
function.description: Save file in Google Drive

parentId.description: Folder : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which Folder to save files to. Defaults to the users root folder if left blank. (example: "{{settings.folder}}")

sharedDrive.description: Shared Drive : Specify whether the upload target is a shared drive. Defaults to false.

filename.description: File Name : Defaults to origin file name if left blank.

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_EXPORT_DOC
function.description: Export file in Google Drive

fileId.description: File ID : Specify the ID of the File to export (example: "2HlC2Zf57zAst33ht0MEi3WA0_ig4xVKx3-RvzkbvIfE")

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_CREATE_FOLDER
function.description: Create folder in Google Drive

folderName.description: Folder Name : Specify a name for the folder. (example: "Folder 1")

parentId.description: Parent ID : Specify the parent ID to create folder within the parent

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_DELETE_FOLDER
function.description: Delete folder in Google Drive

folderId.description: Folder ID : The ID of the folder. (example: "1PVW0QtmQv-829KNvV3DLbYL8WrpS4zhtPx2Ok")

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_GET_FOLDER_BY_ID
function.description: Get folder by Id in Google Drive

folderId.description: Folder ID : The ID of the folder. (example: "1PVW0QtmQv-829KNvV3DLbYL8WrpS4zhtPx2Ok")

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_MOVE_FOLDER
function.description: Move folder in Google Drive

folderId.description: Folder ID : The ID of the folder. (example: "1PVW0QtmQv-829KNvV3DLbYL8WrpS4zhtPx2Ok")

parentId.description: Parent ID : Specify the parent ID to move folder within the parent (example: "1PVW0QtmQv-829KNvV3DLbYL8WrpS4zhtPx2Ok")

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_LIST_FILES
function.description: List files in Google Drive

parentId.description: Folder : Use Connect Portal Workflow Settings to allow users to select which Folder to get files from. Defaults to the users root folder if unspecified. (example: "{{settings.folder}}")

pageSize.description: Page Size : Specify the number of files to include on a page. Accepts values from 1 to 1000. Defaults to 100 if unspecified. (example: "100")

includeSharedItems.description: Include Shared Drive Items : Specify whether search results should include files in shared drives. Defaults to false.

function.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_SEARCH_FOLDERS
function.description: Search folders in Google Drive

parentId.description: Parent ID : Specify the parent ID to search within the parent

driveId.description: Drive ID : Search for shared drives inside shared parents

pageSize.description: Page Size : Specify the number of folders to include on a page. Accepts values from 1 to 1000. Defaults to 100 if unspecified.

filterFormula.description: Search for folders based on filter formula. For Example: var1 = "val1", var2 < "val2"
